title: Wild Fighters
overview: From the Iberian Peninsula to the world, animals live in continuous fight to ensure their survival. But what are the reasons that make them risk their lives every day? What are the consequences of winning or losing these battles?There are thousands of types of fight: from hand-to-hand encounters, to dancing, singing, or animal beauty pageants. Behind these fights, there are hidden motives related to mating, hierarchy, territory defense, protection of the family clan and of course, food. At the end of the day, human and animal conflicts are not so different. Welcome to the natural ring of Wild Fighters! Let the show begin!
